mapper.select: select sum(o.sumPrice) as todayOrderTotal from t_order_info o , t_item t where o.itemCode= t.itemCode AND t.idNo ='s0018' AND to_char(orderdate, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate) group by t.idNo

select sum(o.sumPrice) as prevOrderTotal from t_order_info o , t_item t where o.itemCode= t.itemCode AND t.idNo='s0018' AND to_char(orderdate, 'yy/mm') = to_char(to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm'),'yy/mm')-1,'yy/mm') group by t.idNo
